page.title: 08SCHOOL CONTINUED
page.content: {1945 They stayed at school till 14, so there were more children and bigger to play with. {1965} Younger children came out at 3-30. They left when they were 11. There were 80 children.There was a headteacher and 3 other teachers. {1985 lt's very well equipped with computers, books, pens, pencils and writing paper instead of slates. The teachers know a bit more than they used to. We do all different sorts of things. We have electric storage heaters. The floor has dry rot and the roof leaks. We stay at this school till we are 9. There are 44 children in the school which is 2 schools joined. East Knoyle school closed. There is a head and 1 teacher.
